===Noun===
{{ja-noun|やまいぬ}}

# The Japanese [[wolf]], also known as the [[Honshū]] [[wolf]]; now extinct.
# [[wild]] [[dog]]
# [[dhole]]; [[Asian]] wild dog.
# An [[apparition]] of a dog in traditional Japanese tales that may appear to travelers on mountain roads; may be friendly, or may attack and kill the traveler, depending on the tale.
